It's probable that each windows update iteration causes "no internet". To solve this, run cmd with administrator control: Type one by one: 
netsh winsock reset
netsh int ip reset
ipconfig /release
ipconfig /renew
ipconfig /flushdns
Restart the computer. That may fix the problem.

1) Salome, Ukenan, the prophet of the time,
A man of faith, full of agony, yet strong.
I kiss thy lips and head,
A man of honesty and words, with a painted sculpture and a perfect sphincter.
I accompany you through the Tigris and Euphrates,

2) From the first handwritings on the cliffs,
From hullu quinu, the inspiration for all history writers. I never cease repeating your newly shaped residue from the distant past...
A sentence stretched until kings and their makrkabtu begin to parsu.

3) From the dimdim of the annals of history, I look at Sima. We’ll cross the gizzir until we see the sign of lama in the Tigris and Euphrates.
The horses are galloping—or better, rukbu. Akku kuk. Tara ana tuk tuka. Kussu kura, kussu silik.
#elam #oscarwilde #elamite #poem #alborz

Pattern recognition, languages, writing, and problem-solving have become my most enjoyable hobbies as I approach 30. I’ve almost had no choice but to stick with what I’m curious about. My curiosity spans much further, as does my experimentation, but for now, this is where I am.

A Different Man (2024) is a piece full of doubts, guesses, and plot twists, aimed at juxtaposing the beginning and the ending, inciting feelings of conflict, suffering, uneasiness, and longevity. It is a dramatic, mind-blowing study of character development in unusual timing.

I watched Venom: The Last Dance and enjoyed almost all of the VFX shots, which were not perfect. It seemed that the movie wrapped up very quickly. It’s easy to criticize FX work, even with non-professional eyes, but at the same time, it’s super hard when something is unfixable.

But it is also a hard discipline, one that can be criticized unfairly and subjected to each artist’s whim as well as to producers’ final changes for marketing and other purposes. Some movies mock VFX by showcasing low-value FX work.

It’s interesting that while the photorealism problem has been solved in many phases and cases, it still remains a huge technical barrier and an artistic choice at the same time.
#venom #Hollywood #aifilmmaking #compositing
